title: Wakusei Daikaiju Negadon (Negadon: The Monster from Mars)
synopsis: A world of the future, madly over populated, searches for a new home on Mars to help support humanity. After terraforming Mars into a habitable landscape a Japanese ship returning from the planet crash-lands on a Tokyo street, unleashing a terrible monster. The only man who can stop Negadon is Dr. Narasaki, and his robot Miroku...
staff: [['Awazu, Jun', ['Director', ' Script', ' Original Creator']], ['Terasawa, Shingo', ['Sound Effects', ' Music']]]
